bio:
Sergius Turrianus is an Imperial enchanter working and living at the College of Winterhold.
Sergius Turrianus teaches Enchanting at the expert-level. If the Dragonborn's enchanting exceeds what Sergius can teach, and they ask him to enchant items for them, he tells them to do it themselves.
He can be found in the Hall of the Elements by day. At night, he sleeps on the second floor in the Hall of Countenance.
name: Sergius Turrianus
notes: Free free to change assigned voice model
